content.text: 0) In a bowl, stir together garlic, goat cheese, celery, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@14:18 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "garlic"@28:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "goat cheese"@36:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "celery"@49:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "balsamic vinegar"@57:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "olive oil"@79:88 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Season to taste with salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "salt and pepper"@24:39 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-1-0 "to taste"@10:18 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Blend well until the sauce is smooth.
